name: What's The Deal With Alien Murder Game Shows? 2nd Edition
name_original: What's The Deal With Alien Murder Game Shows? 2nd Edition
description:
Made for UGJ 2020 in 48 hours

Theme: Two

Play as a human stuck in an alien's game-show where you, against other aliens race to collect the most amount of points within 20 seconds. But there's catch! The winner is the one who gets second place. The challenge lies in balancing yourself in between first and third place. The relation to "two" can be found in the "2nd" place that is needed to win. I also tried to fit in as many twos as possible.

Quick Guide:

Move with wasd or arrows

Green Coin= +2 points

Blue Coin= +10 points

Orange Coin=-2 points

Red Coin=-10 points

Gold Coin= x2 total points

Black Coin= /2 total points

Hourglass=+2.22 seconds on the timer

Assets:

The game was made in unity https://unity.com/

Some sound clips are from a licensed copy of Game Master Audio's Pro Sound Collection found here https://www.gamemasteraudio.com/

fonts used can be found here https://www.1001freefonts.com/computer-fonts.php 

All other assets were created by me during the 48 hour timespan using tools such as:

Aseprite: https://www.aseprite.org/

Waveform free:https://www.tracktion.com/products/waveform-free\

wow thanks for 16th! I have released a new version with very few bug fixes. Also released a WebGL version.
